```{r}
fish = read.table("fish.txt", header=T,fileEncoding = "euc-kr")
str(fish)
head(fish)
```

split

```{r}
fishsplit = split(fish, fish$종명)
attach(fishsplit)
go = 고등어
nun = 눈볼대
duck = 덕대
myul = 멸치
ban = 밴댕이
bo = 보구치
bul = 붉은메기
sat = 샛멸
sung = 성대
jeon = 전갱이
ju = 주둥치
cham = 참돔
hwangd = 황돔
hwanga = 황아귀 
```

 
```{r message=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(gridExtra)
```


boxplot


```{r}
fish %>% ggplot(aes(종명,TL)) + geom_jitter(col='dodgerblue4') + geom_boxplot(alpha=.8) + theme_classic()+ coord_flip()

fish %>% ggplot(aes(종명,log(BW))) + geom_jitter(col='dodgerblue4') + geom_boxplot(alpha=.8) + theme_classic()+ coord_flip()
```


frequency polygon


```{r}
p1 <- go %>% ggplot(aes(TL)) + geom_freqpoly(col="dodgerblue4",binwidth=30) + theme_classic() + labs(title="Scomber japonicus")
p2 <- nun %>% ggplot(aes(TL)) + geom_freqpoly(col="dodgerblue4",binwidth=30) + theme_classic() + labs(title="Doederleinia berycoides")
p3 <- cham %>% ggplot(aes(TL)) + geom_freqpoly(col="dodgerblue4",binwidth=30) + theme_classic()+ labs(title="Pagrus major")
p4 <- sung %>% ggplot(aes(TL)) + geom_freqpoly(col="dodgerblue4",binwidth=30) + theme_classic()+ labs(title="Chelidonichthys spinosus")
grid.arrange(p1,p2,p3,p4,ncol=2)

p1 <- go %>% ggplot(aes(BW)) + geom_freqpoly(col="dodgerblue4",binwidth=30) + theme_classic()+ labs(title="Scomber japonicus")
p2 <- nun %>% ggplot(aes(BW)) + geom_freqpoly(col="dodgerblue4",binwidth=30) + theme_classic()+ labs(title="Doederleinia berycoides")
p3 <- cham %>% ggplot(aes(BW)) + geom_freqpoly(col="dodgerblue4",binwidth=30) + theme_classic()+ labs(title="Pagrus major")
p4 <- sung %>% ggplot(aes(BW)) + geom_freqpoly(col="dodgerblue4",binwidth=30) + theme_classic()+ labs(title="Chelidonichthys spinosus")
grid.arrange(p1,p2,p3,p4,ncol=2)
```


kernel density estimator 


```{r}
p1 <- go %>% ggplot(aes(TL)) + geom_density(col="dodgerblue4") + theme_classic()+ labs(title="Scomber japonicus")
p2 <- nun %>% ggplot(aes(TL)) + geom_density(col="dodgerblue4") + theme_classic()+ theme_classic()+ labs(title="Doederleinia berycoides")
p3 <- cham %>% ggplot(aes(TL)) + geom_density(col="dodgerblue4") + theme_classic()+ theme_classic()+ labs(title="Pagrus major")
p4 <- sung %>% ggplot(aes(TL)) + geom_density(col="dodgerblue4") + theme_classic()+ theme_classic()+ labs(title="Chelidonichthys spinosus")
grid.arrange(p1,p2,p3,p4,ncol=2)

p1 <- go %>% ggplot(aes(BW)) + geom_density(col="dodgerblue4") + theme_classic()+ labs(title="Scomber japonicus")
p2 <- nun %>% ggplot(aes(BW)) + geom_density(col="dodgerblue4") + theme_classic()+ theme_classic()+ labs(title="Doederleinia berycoides")
p3 <- cham %>% ggplot(aes(BW)) + geom_density(col="dodgerblue4") + theme_classic()+ theme_classic()+ labs(title="Pagrus major")
p4 <- sung %>% ggplot(aes(BW)) + geom_density(col="dodgerblue4") + theme_classic()+ theme_classic()+ labs(title="Chelidonichthys spinosus")
grid.arrange(p1,p2,p3,p4,ncol=2)
```


scatterplot 


```{r}
plot(go$TL ,go$BW, xlab="TL", ylab="WW", pch=19, cex=0.7,main="Scomber japonicus")
plot(nun$TL ,nun$BW, xlab="TL", ylab="WW", pch=19, cex=0.7,main="Doederleinia berycoides")
plot(nun$TL ,nun$BW, xlab="TL", ylab="WW", pch=19, cex=0.7,main="Doederleinia berycoides")
```
